# Big Data Science - BIT107

The material associated with this git hub repository is workshop instructions linked to the Big Data Science Module BIT107, integral module for the Msc in Big Data Biology hosted by [Cardiff School of Biosciences](https://www.cardiff.ac.uk/biosciences "Cardiff School of Biosciences"), Cardiff University. If you would like to know more about our course or any other masters course at [Cardiff University](https://www.cardiff.ac.uk/ "Cardiff University") please visit our website - [Big Data Biology (MSc)](https://www.cardiff.ac.uk/study/postgraduate/taught/courses/course/big-data-biology-msc-full-time-1-year "Big Data Biology (MSc)").
